SELECT DISTINCT cuisine.cuisine_name, recipe.recipe_name, recipe.recipe_image, recipe.recipe_introduction FROM cuisine, recipe, belong WHERE recipe.recipe_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{context}, '%') AND cuisine.pk_cuisine_id = belong.fk_cuisine_id AND recipe.pk_recipe_id = belong.pk_fk_recipe_id;
SELECT fk_user_id, recipe_name, recipe_publish_time, recipe_image, recipe_video, recipe_introduction, recipe_like, recipe_dislike FROM recipe WHERE pk_recipe_id = #{recipeId};
